name: Invictus [SNES]
description:
Thanks for checking out Invictus! This game is in very early stages of development, so please report any bugs or suggestions to me and I will do my best to fix them!

Earn money as your progress through waves in this infinite wave survival. Along your way challenge mother ships and attempt to get the highest score in Invictus!

Note:

I am aware that the game is very easy to "hack" at the moment, this is purely because since the game is in early development, and I want people to be able to test out each feature of the game easily, whilst still having the option to play normally and earn items. This feature will not be in the completed version of Invictus.

Default Controls:

W, S - Forward and backward thrust respectively.

A, D - Left and right rotate respectively.

Space, Left Shift, Left Control - Basic (red cooldown), Special (blue cooldown) and Bomb  (orange cooldown) shoot respectively.

Other Buttons:

P/Escape - Pause and unpause, access pause menu

F - Display FPS Counter

M - Mute and unmute

Credits:

Programming - Michael Duffett

Graphic Design - Idraki Radzi

Music:

Kevin West A.K.A. Dragon Cola
